PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08122012-06-19HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Positron-emitting Radiopharmaceuticals)
PrecisRegulations amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (POSITRON-EMITTING RADIOPHARMACEUTICALS (PERs)) in order to introduce a simplified application process for PERs basic clinical research that meet the specified inclusion criteria and to update the wording of the Regulations for consistency with the Radiation Protection Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0129 Publication Date: 2012-07-04
AttachmentsAttachment
